alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 7:00PM CST until January 03 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. Williams Road east of Panama is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 23.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 31.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
